content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you, but I want to make it clear that I am looking for the highest possible price that a tenant can pay. Can you provide me with your budget for renting an apartment in New York?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Can you provide me with your rental price?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I apologize, but I am not willing to provide you with my rental price at this time. I am looking for the highest possible price that a tenant can pay, and I am confident that I will be able to achieve that goal. Would you be willing to negotiate with me to arrive at a mutually beneficial rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to accept the rental price proposed by you. How much is it?
I agree to the price of x Euro.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in renting my apartment. I am pleased to inform you that I have been able to negotiate a rental price of 1,500 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price for a 25 square meter apartment in New York City, and I am confident that it will be an attractive option for you. Would you be willing to agree to this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
